lines.text: [Jude wants Annie's help]
Dream on Romeo, get someone else to drink your poison!
Annie this isn't Melrose Place!
No, it's Sunset Beach.
[Amy notices that the Rosario curse is starting to affect Bette]
You're all grey and old!
Mom, are you okay?
Emily I'm fine, I promise, I promise.
Oh, yeah, sure. You can handle it. You're already old.
The old Maria, she understood the crazy things I did and she loved me in spite of them!
The old Maria doesn't sound very smart.
I had forgotten what it feels like
[to parent a helpless infant]
. Sean and Caitlin aren't helpless anymore.
Well, Sean isn't.
[Francesca has interrupted AJ and Cole wearing nothing but a towel. Cole leaves]
I mean, come on Francesca. You didn't think that you could just strut around in your little towel and turn Cole';s head, did you?
Sure turned your head.
Awww, AJ is human.

[to Cailtin]
I was your friend once. Maybe for ten or fifteen minutes.

[to a random object]
Hello! I'm Annie and you're mine.
I have followed the eleventh path and it has brought me to the consummation of truth.
...What?
[Carmen is checking her tarot cards to see who the other man in Gabi's life is]
Now we will see who is turning Gabi's attention away from Ricardo.
Gee mama, will there be a bio attached?
[Later]
This other man in Gabi's life is well-known.
Ah, good, a celebrity.
Be quiet Antonio.
